metadata.titleEn: TP-PROFILE monitoring of the troposphere over the Tibetan Plateau (2021-2022)
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原对流层大气微波辐射计观测网数据（2021-2022）
metadata.description: Ground-based microwave radiometers (MWR) operating in the K- and V-band (20–60 GHz) for temperature and humidity observations, respectively, are most sensitive to the lowest part of the atmosphere. “The Second Tibetan Plateau Scientific Expedition and Research programme (STEP)”, the TP-PROFILE project  construct a comprehensive troposphere observation network for studying the synoptic process and environment change on the TP. The MWR instrument used in this study was an MWP967KV temperature, humidity, and liquid profiler, which operates in eight K-band (22.235, 22.50, 23.035, 23.835, 25.00, 26.235, 28.0, and 30.0 GHz) and fourteen V-band (51.25, 51.760, 52.28, 52.8, 53.34, 53.85, 54.4, 54.94, 55.50, 56.02, 56.66, 57.29, 57.96, and 58.80 GHz) microwave channels. It measures the radiation intensity of the sky in 22 different frequency channels. A neural network retrieval method has been constructed to retrieve the temperature, water vapor density, and liquid water density profiles, as well as the CWV and LWP, from the brightness temperature measurements.  During the field experiment, the nine MWRs were configured to conduct zenith scans. Only the zenith scan data were used to retrieve the thermodynamic profiles of the troposphere up to 10 km, which were normally available every 2 minutes.，data format：Record	 Date/Time	10	Tamb(C) （surface tempe）	Rh(%)	（surface humidity）Pres(hPa)（pressure）	Tir(℃)	（infared temperature）Rain（flag for rainfall）	Vint(cm) （0-10km column water vapor）	Lqint(mm) (0-10kmcolumn liquid water path)	CloudBase(km，) （cloud base height）	0.000km （0m above ground）	0.050km （50m above ground）	0.100km （100m above ground）	0.150km （150m above ground）	0.200km	（200m above ground）0.250km	（250m above ground）……9.750km	（9.75km above ground）10.000km(10km above ground), nine sites inlude MAWORS，NADOR，Mangai，Naqu，Changdu，Leshan，QOMS，SETS，Kabu.
metadata.descriptionCn:
利用二次科考项目在青藏高原建立的微波辐射计观测网络获得了青藏高原对流层（地面以上0-10km）2021年1月至2022年6月的观测数据，观测变量包括大气温度、湿度廓线，廓线高度分58层和83层两种观测模式，变量说明：
Record（记录数）、Date/Time（记录时间）、10	Tamb(C) （地表温度）、Rh（%）（地表湿度）、Pres（hPa）（地表气压）、Tir（℃）（热红外温度）、Rain（有无降水标志）、Vint（cm）（0-10km累积水汽量）、Lqint（mm）（0-10km累积液态含水量）、CloudBase（km）（云底高度）、0.000km （0高度层）、0.050km （50米高度）、0.100km （100米高度）、0.150km （150米高度）、0.200km（200米高度）、0.250km（250米高度）……9.750km（9.75公里高度）、10.000km（10公里高度），观测站点包括：MAWORS，NADOR，Mangai，Naqu，Changdu，Leshan，QOMS，SETS，Kabu等。数据格式见说明文档。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to observe atmospheric temperature and humidity profiles in the troposphere over the Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于观察青藏高原对流层大气温度和湿度剖面的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used to observe atmospheric temperature and humidity profiles in the troposphere over the Tibetan Plateau is the use of a microwave radiometer observation network. This network was established as part of a scientific expedition project and collected data from January 2021 to June 2022. The network includes multiple observation stations, such as MAWORS, NADOR, Mangai, Naqu, Changdu, Leshan, QOMS, SETS, and Kabu. The dataset includes variables like atmospheric temperature and humidity profiles at different altitude layers, ranging from the surface to 10 km above ground, using 58-layer and 83-layer observation modes.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于观察青藏高原对流层大气温度和湿度剖面的数据收集方法之一是使用微波辐射计观测网络。该网络作为科学考察项目的一部分建立，收集了2021年1月至2022年6月的数据。网络包括多个观测站，如MAWORS、NADOR、Mangai、Naqu、Changdu、Leshan、QOMS、SETS和Kabu。数据集包括不同高度层的大气温度和湿度剖面变量，范围从地面到10公里高，使用58层和83层观测模式。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific attributes measured by a microwave radiometer network in the troposphere over the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau during the period from 2021 to 2022?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在2021年至2022年期间，青藏高原的微波辐射计网络测量了对流层的哪些具体属性？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: atmospheric temperature profiles, humidity profiles, surface temperature, surface humidity, surface pressure, thermal infrared temperature, presence of precipitation, integrated water vapor content, integrated liquid water content, cloud base height
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 大气温度剖面、湿度剖面、地表温度、地表湿度、地表气压、热红外温度、降水存在、综合水汽含量、综合液态水含量、云底高度

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes discrepancies in microwave radiometer observations of the troposphere over the Tibetan Plateau, particularly between different observational modes (58 layers vs. 83 layers)?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致对青藏高原大气层微波辐射计观测结果出现差异的原因是什么，特别是在不同观测模式（58层与83层）之间？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The discrepancies in microwave radiometer observations may be caused by the different observational modes used, which include varying layer heights (58 layers vs. 83 layers). Variations in atmospheric temperature, humidity profiles, and the presence of clouds or precipitation can contribute to such discrepancies. Additionally, the geographical and meteorological complexity of the Tibetan Plateau might affect the consistency and accuracy of observations across different stations like MAWORS, NADOR, Mangai, and others.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 微波辐射计观测中的差异可能是由于使用了不同的观测模式，这些模式包括不同的层高度（58层与83层）。大气温度、湿度剖面的变化，以及云或降水的存在都可能导致这些差异。此外，青藏高原的地理和气象复杂性可能会影响不同站点（如MAWORS、NADOR、Mangai等）之间观测的一致性和准确性。
